mapper.update:
update tb_brand
brand_initial = #{brandInitial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
series = #{series,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
announce_year = #{announceYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logo_picture_path = #{logoPicturePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_brand set brand_initial = #{brandInitial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, series = #{series,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, announce_year = #{announceYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo_picture_path = #{logoPicturePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.brand_initial AS NAME FROM tb_brand a LEFT JOIN tb_customer_link_brand b ON a.id=b.brand_id LEFT JOIN tb_user c ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE c.id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY a.brand_initial ORDER BY a.brand_initial
SELECT brand as name,logo_picture_path as url FROM tb_brand WHERE brand_initial=#{initial,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY brand,logo_picture_path
SELECT MAX(id),series as name,model_picture_path as url FROM tb_brand WHERE brand= #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY series,model_picture_path
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_brand WHERE brand=#{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND series=#{series,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND model=#{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND announce_year = #{announceYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
